p:
We used the ISRIC WISE database
23 to extract C/N ratios for mineral soils. We excluded all Histosols, and any soils with C/N ratios of either <5 or >100 and soil organic C concentration > 200 mg g −1, assuming that they carry analytical errors (C/N ratios) or represent organic soils not classified as Histosols. The median C/N ratio of this reduced data set ( n = 22,959) is 10.7.
